name: unjaded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you are unjaded, you have not lost interest in something because you have experienced it many times: She's been in the music business for three decades but still sounds fresh and unjaded in interviews. He spoke with all the passion of a young, unjaded politician. Opposite
jaded
More examplesFewer examplesShe still talks about pottery with unjaded enthusiasm despite having been making ceramics for many years.To the unjaded eye, there is still something very appealing about his drawings.The young actress was unjaded enough to be excited to mix with the big movie stars.
